text: I'm looking for a restaurant in the west part of town that serves German food. If not, Italian would be fine. Can you help me find one?

Unfortunately, I couldn't find any German restaurants in the west part of Cambridge. However, I did find a few Italian restaurants in that area. Here are a few options:

1. Prezzo (21 - 24 Northampton Road) - This Italian restaurant serves a variety of pasta dishes, pizzas, and risottos. They have a cozy atmosphere and a wide selection of wines.
2. Ask Restaurant (12 Bridge Street) - This Italian restaurant offers a range of traditional Italian dishes, including pasta, pizza, and risotto. They also have a great selection of wines and a cozy atmosphere.

Both of these restaurants are located in the west part of Cambridge and serve Italian food. If you're interested in trying one of them, I can give you more information or help you make a reservation.
I'd like to know the phone number of one of these Italian restaurants. Can you give me the phone number for Prezzo?
The phone number for Prezzo is 01799521260.

Thank you for the phone number. That's all I need.

Thank you for your help. Goodbye.

END
It was my pleasure to assist you. Have a great day and enjoy your meal at Prezzo (or wherever you choose to dine)! Goodbye!
